channel.title: [php]URL parameter
channel.description: Ive been working on a search feature for a school club. and i came across the URL parameter. I need to know how to create one ??? i am very good in php but if this is a really easy concept dont flame me please. i have madwares.com/register/search.php it works until it tries to show the information which is at the results page. if any1 can help me here id appreciate it. (please don't register and spam my database.....)

item.title: [php]URL parameter
item.dc:creator: @Cald_Panda Cald Panda
item.description:
@Cald_Panda wrote:

what would you consider very good at php?

If you are talking about the GET function. How did you want to use your “URL Parameter”?

Read full topic

item.title: [php]URL parameter
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

I’m sure you’re very good in PHP.

I mean, since there’s an error page, and you can’t fix the error. PHP tells you exactly where it is, and usually exactly what’s wrong with it.

Read full topic
